          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure of a triglyceride molecule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur eines Triglyzeridmoleküls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure d'une molécule de triglycéride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura de uma molécula do triglyceride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura di una molecola del trigliceride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή ενός triglyceride μορίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de una molécula del triglyceride</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the structure of a triglyceride molecule indicating its polar head, formed from propane-1,2,3-triol molecule, and its nonpolar tail, formed by three long-chain fatty acids.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">2</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">3-triol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fatty acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nonpolar tail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polar head</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">propane-1</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">triglyceride molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Struktur eines 
Triglyzeridmoleküls, das seinen polaren Kopf anzeigt, gebildet vom 
propane-1,2,3-triol Molekül und sein nichtpolares Endstück, gebildet
durch drei langkettige Fettsäuren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la structure d'une 
molécule de triglycéride indiquant sa tête polaire, formée de la 
molécule de propane-1,2,3-triol, et sa queue non polaire, constituée
par trois acides gras à longue chaîne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a estrutura de uma 
molécula do triglyceride que indica sua cabeça polar, dada forma da 
molécula de propane-1,2,3-triol, e sua cauda nonpolar, dada forma por
três ácidos fatty long-chain.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la struttura di una 
molecola del trigliceride che indica la relativa testa polare, formata
dalla molecola di propane-1,2,3-triol e la relativa coda non polare, 
costituita da tre acidi grassi a catena lunga.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη δομή ενός 
triglyceride μορίου που δείχνει το πολικό κεφάλι της, που 
διαμορφώνονται από το μόριο προπάνιο-1.2.3-τρηολ, και μη πολική 
ουρά της, που διαμορφώνεται από τρία long-chain λιπαρά οξέα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la estructura de una 
molécula del triglyceride que indica su cabeza polar, formada de la 
molécula de propane-1,2,3-triol, y su cola no polar, formada por tres
ácidos grasos de larga cadena.</string>
          </description>
